comment:
* V4 signature fields.
 * Keep in sync with APKSig master copy.
 * @hide

variables.name: hashingInfo
variables.comment:
* Raw byte array containing the IncFS hashing data.
     * @see HashingInfo#fromByteArray(byte[])

variables.name: signingInfo
variables.comment:
* Raw byte array containing the V4 signature data. *

Passed as-is to the kernel. Can be retrieved later. * @see SigningInfo#fromByteArray(byte[])

methods.name: public static V4Signature readFrom(ParcelFileDescriptor pfd) throws IOException
public static V4Signature readFrom(@NonNull byte[] bytes) throws IOException
methods.comment: * Construct a V4Signature from a byte array.

methods.name: public byte[] toByteArray()
methods.comment: * Store the V4Signature to a byte-array.

methods.name: public static byte[] getSigningData(long fileSize, HashingInfo hashingInfo, SigningInfo signingInfo)
methods.comment:
* Combines necessary data to a signed data blob.
     * The blob can be validated against signingInfo.signature.
     *
     * @param fileSize - size of the signed file (APK)
